It's building up The Inhumans in a big way. Right now they're doing The Secret Warriors storyline and they have an annual crossover for whatever movie comes out at in may. They've been teasing Civil War. Now it's not a super hero show its a spy show with superhero elements so don't expect big CGI fest fights most of the times it's just hand to hand that might change a little because of the Secret Warriors forming. But if you like a show with great character interactions like in the movies, bad ass women, and great obscure characters that will never be in the movies watch it.
